meanings.definition: A material that is used to prevent the passage of heat or electricity.
meanings.sent1: The insulant kept the house warm during the winter.
meanings.sent2: The insulant was placed around the wires to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The insulant decided to take a break and relax in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an insulant against the harsh words of others.
meanings.sent5: The insulant wrapped around the pipe like a protective shield.

meanings.definition: A person who is isolated or detached from others.
meanings.sent1: The insulant preferred spending time alone in the library.
meanings.sent2: She felt like an insulant in the crowded room.
meanings.sent3: The insulant joked that they were the only one invited to their own party.
meanings.sent4: His silence made him an insulant in the noisy group.
meanings.sent5: The insulant stood apart from the group, lost in their own thoughts.
